title: How to install, manage and uninstall programs?
answer:
Installation; you can install applications directly in the preset play store; if you want to install applications on the SD card, enter the file manager, locate the appropriate place for your applications, and click the application to install. 

 Uninstall: Settings > Storage > Click "Apply" > Click the application to be uninstalled > click Uninstall to uninstall; or enter the home screen, hold the application to be uninstalled, and drag it to the place of uninstallation to uninstall.
